activities.name: Get PROD data
activities.description: This loop can be set to rerun prod load N times, or until it runs successfully. The condition is set up in the setting of the until loop. Counters are set up and added to within the loop

activities.name: Add to temp prod
activities.description: temporary variable, because ADF does not allow counter=counter+1 type assignments

activities.name: Add to prod counter
activities.description: using the temp variable to add 1 to the actual prod counter

oracleReaderQuery.value: select * from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS WHERE OWNER = '@{activity('Get PROD instance info').output.firstRow.SOURCE_SCHEMA}'

activities.name: Continue only if PROD succeeded
activities.description: Throws an error if the Get Prod data loop ended because it reached the max number of repetitions, not because it succeeded

activities.name: Get ARCH data
activities.description: This loop is set to rerun arch load N times, or until it runs successfully. The condition is set up in the setting of this 'until' loop. Counters are set up and added to within the loop itself

activities.name: Add to arch counter
activities.description: using the temp variable to add to the arch counter

activities.name: Add to temp arch
activities.description: temporary variable, because ADF does not allow counter=counter+1 type assignments

activities.name: Continue only if ARCH succeeded
activities.description: Throws an error if the Get ARCH data loop reached the max number of loops without success.

activities.name: Trigger synapse and archiving pipelines
activities.description: Triggers the synapse pipeline for this instance. At this point, synapse has all the data it needs in ADF stage

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *  FROM dbo.ADF_WMS_CONFIG_TABLES 
WHERE [INSTANCE_NAME]='@{pipeline().parameters.instance_name}'
ORDER BY LOAD_ORDER

SELECT *  FROM dbo.ADF_WMS_CONFIG_TABLES 
WHERE [INSTANCE_NAME]='@{pipeline().parameters.instance_name}'
AND [DELETE_LOGIC_FLAG]=1
ORDER BY LOAD_ORDER
